madkitgroupextension.simulation.probe

Class PropertyProbe<A extends AbstractAgent & MKGEAbstractAgent,P>

  • java.lang.Object
    • madkitgroupextension.kernel.Probe<A>
      • madkitgroupextension.simulation.probe.PropertyProbe<A,P>
  • Type Parameters:
    A - the group's agent most common class type (i.e. AbstractAgent)
    P - the type of the property, i.e. Integer (this works if the field is an int, i.e. a primitive type)
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    GroupChangementNotifier

    public class PropertyProbe<A extends AbstractAgent & MKGEAbstractAgent,P>
extends Probe<A>
    The class PropertyProbe of MadKitGroupExtension is similar to the class PropertyProbe of MadKit. The provided documentation is copy/pasted from the original documentation of MadKit. Some modifications are done considering the specificities of MadKitGroupExtension. This probe inspects fields of type T on agents of type A and its subclasses.
    Since:
    MadKit 5.0.0.13, MadKitGroupExtension 1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Fabien Michel, Jason Mahdjoub

    • Method Detail

      • adding

        protected void adding(A theAgent)
        Called when an agent has joined the corresponding group(s) and role. This method is protected because it is automatically called by the MadKit kernel. Override this method when you want to do some initialization when an agent enters the group/role.
        Overrides:
        adding in class Probe<A extends AbstractAgent & MKGEAbstractAgent>
        Parameters:
        theAgent - which has been added to this group/role

      • adding

        protected void adding(List<A> agents)
        Called when a list of agents have leaved the corresponding group(s) and role. This method is protected because it is automatically called by the MadKit kernel. Override this method when you want to do some initialization on the agents that enter the group/role.
        Overrides:
        adding in class Probe<A extends AbstractAgent & MKGEAbstractAgent>
        Parameters:
        agents - the list of agents which have been removed from this group/role
